Sentencas: This study reports the catalytic and electrochemical characteristics of La(0.8)Sr(0.2)Cr(0.97)V(0.03)O(3)
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells
Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Catalytic properties of LSCV for the methane steam reforming have been carried out at 800 degreesC. This oxide exhibits a low activity.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The most important fact is that no carbon deposit was detected.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We have investigated electrochemical behaviour of a LSCV-YSZ composite (YSZ: yttria stabilised zirconia) in H(2)-H(2)O and in CH(4)-H(2)O atmosphere by impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Impedance diagrams are composed of two contributions at high-frequency (HF, typically 100 Hz) and at medium-frequency (MF, typically 1 Hz).
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 800 degreesC, the normalised value of the MF resistance is only three-times higher than that obtained with an optimised Ni-YSZ cermet.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In fact, the large difference comes from the HF resistance which is lower for the Ni-YSZ cermet by a factor of 20.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This could be explained by the microstructure of the interface of the LSCV-YSZ composite layer and the electrolyte pellet which has to be improved.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In CH(4)-H(2)O, an additional semicircle at low-frequency (noted as LF, typically 0.1 Hz) is observed.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This LF contribution might be associated with the catalytic rate of the steam reforming of methane reaction.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ruthenium, as a steam reforming catalyst, was added to the LSCV-YSZ electrode.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 800 degreesC, in pure methane mixed with 5% of steam, this anode material shows similar results to those observed in H(2)-H(2)O without ruthenium.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, electrochemical behaviour was stable with time and no carbon deposit was detected after 100 h of operation.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results demonstrated that the gradual methane reforming can be implemented.
Titulo: Alternative anode material for gradual methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells
